0P00008SRL.HK.long_name: BCOM Joyful Retirement MPF Scheme-BCOM Stable Growth (CF) Fund
0P00008SRL.HK.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to achieve a long term return in excess of Hong Kong price inflation as measured by the Consumer Price Index Type A.

0P00008SUR.HK.long_name: Sun Life MPF Comprehensive Scheme Stable Growth Portfolio
0P00008SUR.HK.summary: The objective is to achieve medium capital growth with medium to low volatility by investing in a diversified portfolio of collective investment schemes that normally invests in global bonds and equities with equal emphasis. The target asset allocation is 50% equities, and 50% bonds and cash. It is a medium risk fund portfolio and appropriate for middle-aged investors who are willing to take medium risk in return for moderate capital growth (Value of this portfolio will fluctuate both upwards and downwards). The fund invests in a single approved pooled investment fund managed by HSBC Investment Funds (Hong Kong) Limited and may also hold cash up to 5% of its assets.
